title: Advanced Semiconductor Classifiers using Machine Learning Techniques
description: An innovative method to perform advanced semiconductor classification using logistic regression and a random forest classifier is proposed. Testing semiconductors is a crucial step in the production process, especially as the complexity of integrated circuit (IC) designs and the competitive pressure on the market rise. This work provides an examination on how to perform automated testing using machine learning techniques.

title: XGBoost-Based Prediction and Evaluation Model for Enchanting Subscribers in Industrial Sector
description: An innovative XGBoost method to enhance company engagement with customers using machine learning concepts. The paper evaluates parameters for subscriber shortfall and proposes progression strategies for revenue enhancement in industrial management systems.
